$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/modules/librar.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/modules/library/Motion.min.js
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/modules/library/mousetrap.min.js

$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/modules/startu.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/modules/startup/motion.min.js

$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/Help.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/Help
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/Help.subtitle: {{||$:/esc}}
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/Help.caption: Keyboard shortcuts
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/Help.text:
\define shortcut(shortcut) <$set name=kbd filter="[enlist:raw{$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/config/Shortcuts/$shortcut$/Key}addprefix[]addsuffix[]]"> <> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/config/Shortcuts/$shortcut$/Caption" /> \end
<$list filter="[enlist[Fullscreen ToggleSidebar GoToInbox RefreshWiki GoToGettingStarted GoToControlPanel GoToSearch ToggleLayout TogglePalette GoToPlugins]]"> <$macrocall $name="shortcut" shortcut=<> />
<$list filter="[enlist[FocusSearch ShowHelp Dismiss]]"> <$macrocall $name="shortcut" shortcut=<> />
<$list filter="[enlist[CreateNewTiddler SelectNextTiddler SelectPreviousTiddler GoToFirstTiddler GoToLastTiddler EditTiddler DeleteTiddler CloseTiddler CloseAllTiddlers]]"> <$macrocall $name="shortcut" shortcut=<> />
<$list filter="[enlist[FoldTiddler UnfoldTiddler ToggleTiddler FoldAllTiddlers UnfoldAllTiddlers ToggleAllTiddlers]]"> <$macrocall $name="shortcut" shortcut=<> />

$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/README.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/README
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/README.text:
Vim-like keyboard shortcuts for TiddlyWiki. modified `based benwebber/motion`
!! Usage Press {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/config/Shortcuts/ShowHelp/Key}} to show keyboard shortcuts. !! NOTE * if your computer installed some vim extensions, such as surfing-keys or vimium, this plugin maybe not work !! TODO * suport create default markdown tiddler * ss sr so * ÊîØÊåÅÂÉèÁ¥†ÊªöÂä® ``` // map multiple combinations to the same callback Mousetrap.bind(['command+k', 'ctrl+k'], function() { console.log('command k or control k'); // return false to prevent default browser behavior // and stop event from bubbling return false; }); ```

$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/styles/dynamic.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/styles/dynamic
$:/plugins/oeyoews/motion/styles/dynamic.text:
<!-- not work -->

<$list filter="[{$:/state/plugins/oeyoews/motion/selected}] [has[draft.of]field:draft.of{$:/state/plugins/oeyoews/motion/selected}] +[escapecss[]]">
[data-tiddler-title=<<currentTiddler>>] {
  outline: <<colour primary>> 2px solid;
  border: red 2px solid;
}
</$list>
